author: Katherine Faulders, Molly Nagle
title: Biden campaign offers to help state, local officials with coronavirus response
description: Former Vice President Joe Biden's campaign is reaching out to state and local officials offering to assist with their responses to the COVID-19 pandemic.
content:
Former Vice President Joe Biden's campaign is reaching out to state and local officials offering to assist with their responses to the COVID-19 pandemic.
According to an email addressed to State and Local Officials and obtained by ABC News, the campaign is s… [+4163 chars]
